file.name: StudyTypes_GET.yaml
file.content:
info:
  title: BrAPI
  version: ''
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /studytypes:
    get:
      summary: Get the Study Types
      description: Call to retrieve the list of study types.
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/page'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/pageSize'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                properties:
                  '@context':
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
                  metadata:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/metadata'
                  result:
                    properties:
                      data:
                        description: the list of all study types available in this server.
                        items:
                          type: string
                        type: array
                        example:
                          - Crossing Nursery
                          - Yield study
                    required:
                    - data
                    type: object
                required:
                - metadata
                - result
                title: studyTypesResponse
                type: object
          description: OK
          headers: {}
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
      tags:
      - Studies

Error: parse: paths: /studytypes: get: : parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "#/components/parameters/page" reference: component by reference "#/components/parameters/page" not found
